description: Provides functionality for elements that can be be clicked.
Provides functionality for elements that can be be clicked.

params.name: handler
params.doc:
The name of the function or
 the function expression to run when the element is clicked.
params.srcDoc:
The name of the function or
 the function expression to run when the element is clicked.

ret.doc: The element to which the event handler was added.
ret.srcDoc: The element to which the event handler was added.

docs.summary: Adds an event handler that runs when the element is clicked.
description: An element receives a `click` event when a user clicks on the element
When a user double-clicks an element, two `click` events are fired
before a `doubleClick` event is also fired.

examples.title: Get the ID of the element that was clicked
Get the coordinates of a mouse click

docs.summary: Adds an event handler that runs when the element is double-clicked.
description: An element receives a `dblClick` event when a user double-clicks on the element
When a user double-clicks an element, two `click` events are fired
before a `doubleClick` event is also fired.

examples.title: Get the ID of the element that was double-clicked

before a `doubleClick` event is also fired.
